name: Royal Welsh Winter Fair

heroImage.alt: Royal Welsh Winter Fair with Christmas shoppers and livestock

description: When the Llanelwedd showground transforms into a festive wonderland each late November, you know the Christmas season has truly begun. One of Europe's finest prime stock shows meets Wales's most spectacular Christmas shopping experience across two packed days. Watch champion cattle, sheep, and pigs compete for prestigious winter titles while the legendary Food Hall tempts you with the finest Welsh producers showcasing their seasonal delights. From artisan gifts to farming equipment, from mulled wine to prize-winning Welsh lambâ€”the Winter Fair is where farming, food, and festivities collide in the most wonderfully Welsh way possible.
